sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.student_no, student.real_name, student.gender, student.id_card, student.birth_date, student.phone, student.email, student.address FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND student.real_name LIKE '孙%' AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.student_no, base.real_name, base.gender, base.id_card, base.birth_date, base.phone, base.email, base.address FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射
根据字段描述“专业名称”及任务中已规范化为“计算机科学与技术”映射
根据字段描述“学生姓名”使用前缀匹配 '孙%'
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”映射为“男”

result.address: 湖北省宜昌市西陵区三峡科技MOCK大学
